Name: Viridescent Venerer
Title: Dream of Broken Leaves: Viridescent Venerer
Desc: "One day, in those boundless hunting grounds... we will meet again."

Talent.Name: Viridescent Venerer
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Skill:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo</color> Die. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be {SPRITE_PRESET#1105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo</color>.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
